name: Morph
body:
# Morph
A puzzle solving game to keep you occupied on those long flights home.

Morph is a Coffee Cats Games production. Contact us for questions, support, or feedback at coffeecatsgames AT gmail DOT com.

# Get it
Download it from the Windows Store [here](http://www.windowsphone.com/en-us/store/app/morph/c25614db-f68b-4634-9b11-81240cb20145).

# News
Initial Release!

# Tutorial
## How to Play:

1) Click a square. Any square.

2) A square can change any of it's neighbor's color too.

3) Get all squares to final color to win.

4) Click refresh if you get stuck.

![test](https://raw.github.com/Firalet/Morph/master/Website/tutorial0.png)

## Features
-Change colors and sound effects.

![test](https://raw.github.com/Firalet/Morph/master/Website/tutorial1.png)

-100 basic levels.

![test](https://raw.github.com/Firalet/Morph/master/Website/tutorial2.png)

-25 unlockable levels.

![test](https://raw.github.com/Firalet/Morph/master/Website/tutorial3.png)

-Wait, where's R?

# Privacy Policy
There is no monitoring except for the feedback you choose to send, so have fun!

# License
Copyright Megan Chiu, all rights reserved.
